articles.description: After grabbing the offensive rebound, Syracuse's Marek Dolezaj whips a behind-the-back pass to Oshae Brissett to set up a contested layup.
articles.headline: Dolezaj's behind-the-back dime sets up layup

images.caption: After grabbing the offensive rebound, Syracuse's Marek Dolezaj whips a behind-the-back pass to Oshae Brissett to set up a contested layup.
images.name: Dolezaj's behind-the-back dime sets up layup

articles.description: Steve Nash, fellow star point guard Jason Kidd, Grant Hill and Ray Allen are among the 13 finalists for induction into the Naismith Memorial Basketball Hall of Fame.
articles.headline: Steve Nash, Jason Kidd among 13 finalists for Basketball Hall of Fame

images.caption: Steve Nash (left) ranks third in NBA assists, behind only Jason Kidd (right) and career leader John Stockton. Nash and Kidd are among 13 finalists for induction into the Naismith Memorial Basketball Hall of Fame in 2018.
images.name: Jason Kidd and Steve Nash [600x400] - Copy

images.caption: Two-time NBA champ Ray Allen is announced as a finalist for the Basketball Hall of Fame.
images.name: Allen named as 2018 Hall of Fame finalist

articles.description: Oshae Brissett creates space off a pump fake and drives to convert a vicious one-handed dunk.
articles.headline: Cuse's Brissett soars for emphatic one-handed slam

images.caption: Oshae Brissett creates space off a pump fake and drives to convert a vicious one-handed dunk.
images.name: Cuse's Brissett soars for emphatic one-handed slam

articles.description: ESPN's Sean Farnham and Tom Hart reenact Vanderbilt guard Riley LaChance's buzzer beater to beat Mississippi State at Memorial Gymnasium.
articles.headline: Farnham, Hart reenact LaChance's game-winner

images.caption: ESPN's Sean Farnham and Tom Hart reenact Vanderbilt guard Riley LaChance's buzzer beater to beat Mississippi State at Memorial Gymnasium.
images.name: Farnham, Hart reenact LaChance's game-winner

articles.description: Miami's Ja'Quan Newton tries taking it to the paint for a layup but is rejected by Syracuse's Paschal Chukwu.
articles.headline: Chukwu denies Newton inside

articles.description: Kansas coach Bill Self discusses his program's consistency and the challenges the Jayhawks are facing in trying to win their 14th consecutive Big 12 title.
